title: What I am all about.
description: Trustable experienced frontend developer that currently works in a very big company in the Middle east . I have more than 5 years of experience as a frontend developer and participated in many great projects from start to release and then growth . Skilled in JavaScript , ES6 , ReactJs , Redux , Hooks , NodeJs and PWA . I enjoy learning new things and sharing them with the team members . Coordinate with the rest of the team working on different layers of the infrastructure , collaborative problem solving , and quality product is my commitment.  Also Iâ€™m a very fast self-learner that can learn new technologies and switch to them smoothly.
